overview:
Tim is a founding partner of Gold Hill with over 25 years of experience financing venture-backed technology companies. Prior to Gold Hill, Tim worked in a variety of sales and management positions at Silicon Valley Bank. Before Silicon Valley Bank, Tim worked at Citicorp and Bank of America. Tim’s portfolio activities at Gold Hill are concentrated within Silicon Valley and include 3 Pardata, Cavium Networks,Centrality Communications, Wily Technology and Port Authority.

Tim is a graduate of U.C.L.A. with a B.A. in Economics and earned an M.B.A. in Finance from Santa Clara University.
